name: The Invasion On Golsdale
description:
---GAMEPLAY---

Destroy all the blocks in on the level
Each block broken has a chance of dropping a power up or a debuff.
The lives, time, and score are dsiplayed on the left banner.

You may choose between 3 different game modes:
1. Main Gate: Standard arkanoid:
2. The Wizard's Keep: Gives the player debuffs after a certain amount of time
3. The Great Eastern Wall: Destroy 3 layers of brick maps that have different amount of hit points.

---CONTROLS---
 A and D: Left and Right
Space: Launch Ball

---OTHER INFO---
 Music are credited in the credits section of the Main Menu
Enjoy!
